revised_title: Multistability, Oscillations, and Traveling Waves in a Product-Feedback Autocatalator Model: The Initiation and Propagation of Traveling Waves
tldr: The authors study a product-feedback autocatalator model and explore the initiation and propagation of traveling waves in reaction-diffusion systems. They find that the concentrations of reactants and autocatalysts can grow in time, and the system can develop propagating reaction-diffusion waves under specific conditions. The study provides insights into the behavior of complex chemical systems and their potential applications.
